message: SLIDER-1090 fix npe (shanyu zhao via gourksaha)
SLIDER-971 NPE when "slider resolve" with "--out" (kyungwan nam)

@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@

+ * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+ * limitations under the License.
+ */
+
+package org.apache.slider.test
+
+import org.apache.slider.api.ClusterDescription
+import org.junit.Test
+
+/**
+ * Test for some of the command test base operations
+ */
+class TestAssertions {
+  @Test
+  public void testNoInstances() throws Throwable {
+    ClusterDescription clusterDescription = new ClusterDescription();
+    clusterDescription.instances = null
+    SliderTestUtils.assertContainersLive(clusterDescription, "example", 0);
+  }
+
+  @Test
+  public void testEmptyInstances() throws Throwable {
+    ClusterDescription clusterDescription = new ClusterDescription();
+    SliderTestUtils.assertContainersLive(clusterDescription, "example", 0);
+  }
+
+}

message: SLIDER-670 NPE in RMAuthenticationFilter chain, missing httpclient method
SLIDER-1023 Configure AM via appconf/components/slider-appmaster slider.* options - fix NPE and add null check
SLIDER-659 NPE in slider am-suicide if you don't provide a message
SLIDER-659 NPE in slider am-suicide if you don't provide a message: make sure AM handles null payload

SLIDER-48 reverted some recent changes and accounted for possible NPE
